segments.text: I hear you are planning to travel abroad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'm going to the Untied States for travel . What places do you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In my opinion , there are several places you mustn't miss , like Washington D . C , Las Vegas , New York and Los Angeles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Someone suggests that I should go to Seattle and Hawaii .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you may consider those two places also . Seattle , for example , is worth visiting and there's a very famous museum called Museum of Flight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And Seattle is the home of Microsoft and Boeing . That must be a great place . I can't miss it .
segments.speaker: S2
